name: Aluminium Pressure Cooker
description: Crafted from virgin aluminium. Extra heavy gauge, rust-free stainless steel vent tube, bakelite heat-resistant handles, and safety valve.

name: Elegance Plain Aluminium Pressure Cooker
description: Premium virgin aluminium, extra heavy gauge. Rust-free SS vent, heat-resistant bakelite handles, safety valve, and curved body for easy stirring.

name: Elegance Handi Aluminium Pressure Cooker
description: Handi shape for traditional Indian cooking, with the same high standards of safety and durability as other Ojas cookers.

name: Elegance Contura Aluminium Pressure Cooker
description: Contura body for convenient stirring. Virgin aluminium, heavy gauge, secure handles and safety features.

name: Hard Anodised Pressure Cooker
description: Hard anodized finish for extra durability and corrosion resistance. Standard Ojas safety and handling features.

name: Stainless Steel Pressure Cooker
description: Rust-proof, elegant stainless steel body. Equipped with all standard Ojas safety and durability features.

name: Single Burner Stove
description: Compact gas stoves ideal for single-burner kitchens, student accommodations or as auxiliary burners.

name: Double Burner Stove
description: Wide range of double-burner stoves in varying finishes, features, and designs for household or semi-commercial use.

name: Triple Burner Stove
description: Triple burner stoves available in different finishes and advanced digital/semi-digital variants. Suitable for larger families.

name: Four Burner Stove
description: Premium four burner gas stove for professional or higher-end contemporary kitchens.

name: Green Gas 2 Burner
description: Eco-friendly model, further details available on request.

name: Original Burner
description: Standard, classic burner style.

name: Thomos Kettle
description: Insulated kettle for hot and cold liquids.

name: Tiffin Capsule
description: Compact, insulated lunch carriers (capsule form) for daily use.

name: Tiffin Tablet
description: Tablet-style insulated lunch boxes for convenient transport.

name: Lite
description: Simple, lightweight thermoware series.

name: Casserole
description: Insulated casseroles for keeping food hot or cold.

name: Travel Jug
description: Large capacity portable jugs with insulation for picnics or travel.

name: Cookware Set
description: Comprehensive kitchen cookware set, suitable for all standard Indian cooking needs.

name: Idli Pot
description: Aluminium idli steamers; available in basic (NP), heavy, and deluxe series for different capacity requirements.

name: Amlet
description: Specialty utensil, likely for making omelettes, as per regional terminology.

name: Bati Bartan
description: Traditional Indian vessel, used for making bati or serving dal-bati; details on sizes on request.

name: Barbeque Aanch
description: Traditional/modern barbeque set for indoor or outdoor grilling.
